00004 #include<PGBasics.hh>

00007 // Defaults
00008 #define OBS_DIM 2
00009 #define DBG_POL false
00010 
00011 using namespace std;
00012 using namespace libpg;
00013 
00021 GridSim::GridSim(int gridSize, double packetGenProb, int bufferSize) {
00022 
00023     assert(packetGenProb <= 1.0);
00024 
00025     this->gridSize = gridSize;
00026     nodes = gridSize*gridSize;
00027     this->packetGenProb = packetGenProb;
00028     this->bufferSize = bufferSize;
00029 
00030     // Init queues
00031     xQueue = new int[gridSize];
00032     yQueue = new int[gridSize];
00033     for (int i=0; i < gridSize; i++) xQueue[i] = yQueue[i] = 0;
00034     
00035     cout <<"Initialised GridSim. Max average reward="<<gridSize*2*packetGenProb<<endl;
00036 }

00039 int GridSim::getObsRows() { return OBS_DIM; }
00040 
00041 int GridSim::getObsCols() { return nodes; }
00042 
00043 int GridSim::getAgents() { return nodes; }
00044 
00045 int GridSim::getActionDim() { return nodes; }
00046 
00050 int GridSim::getRewardDim() { return 1; }
00051 
00055 void GridSim::getReward(Vector& rewards) {
00056 
00057     assert(rewards.size() == 1);
00058     rewards[0] = nextReward;
00059 
00060 }
00061 
00062 
00067 void GridSim::getObservation(Observation& obs) {
00068 
00069     assert((int)obs.getFeatures().size1() == OBS_DIM);
00070     assert((int)obs.getFeatures().size2() == nodes);
00071 
00072     for (int x=0; x < gridSize; x++) {
00073         for (int y=0; y < gridSize; y++) {
00074             obs.getFeatures()(0, y*gridSize + x) = xQueue[x]/bufferSize;
00075             obs.getFeatures()(1, y*gridSize + x) = yQueue[y]/bufferSize;
00076         }
00077     }
00078 
00079 }
00080 
00081 
00086 int GridSim::doAction(Vector& action) {
00087 
00088     nextReward = 0;
00089     assert((int)action.size() == nodes);
00090 
00091     if (DBG_POL) cout<<"Col: ";
00092 
00093     // Look at each column, testing for a clear path
00094     bool clear = true;
00095     bool clearCol = false;
00096     for (int x=0; x < gridSize; x++) {
00097         for (int y=0; y < gridSize; y++) {
00098             if (action[y*gridSize + x] != VERTICAL) {
00099                 clear=false;
00100                 break;
00101             }
00102         }
00103         if (clear) {
00104             // There's a clear column. All waiting traffic gets
00105             // through and contributes to the reward
00106             nextReward += xQueue[x];
00107             xQueue[x] = 0;
00108             if (DBG_POL) cout<<x<<' ';
00109             clearCol = true;
00110         }
00111     }
00112 
00113 
00114     // Look at each row, testing for a clear path
00115     // actually, if any column was clear, this code is redundant.
00116     if (!clearCol) {
00117         if (DBG_POL) cout<<"\nRow: ";
00118         bool clear = true;
00119         for (int y=0; y < gridSize; y++) {
00120             for (int x=0; x < gridSize; x++) {
00121                 if (action[y*gridSize + x] != HORIZONTAL) {
00122                     clear=false;
00123                     break;
00124                 }
00125             }
00126             if (clear) {
00127                 // There's a clear column. All waiting traffic gets
00128                 // through and contributes to the rewadr
00129                 nextReward += yQueue[y];
00130                 if (DBG_POL) cout<<y<<' ';
00131                 yQueue[y] = 0;
00132             }
00133         }
00134     }
00135 
00136 
00137     // Now introduce new traffic
00138     for (int j=0; j < gridSize; j++) {
00139         if (xQueue[j] < bufferSize && 
00140             random()/(double)RAND_MAX <= packetGenProb) xQueue[j]++;
00141 
00142         if (yQueue[j] < bufferSize && 
00143             random()/(double)RAND_MAX <= packetGenProb) yQueue[j]++;
00144 
00145         if (DBG_POL) cout<<"\nxQueue["<<j<<"]="<<xQueue[j]
00146                          <<" yQueue["<<j<<"]="<<yQueue[j]<<endl;
00147     }
00148 
00149     return 0;
00150 }
